nodes.text: Mon Torri was a snowy, mountainous and glacier-covered world that was located within the Mid Rim of the galaxy. Situated between Ord Mantell and Tatooine, it was surrounded by seven rings, each of them a different color and composition.
In 0 ABY, the Eradicator was in the process of impounding a starship near Mon Torri when the Millennium Falcon came out of hyperspace.
